title: Synergistic action of highly-active porous carbon-based bifunctional electrocatalysts and neutral electrolyte: endowing Zinc-air batteries with ultra-long cycle stability
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01603J, Paper
Juanjuan Zhao, Xiaohang Ma, Lingyun Liu, Weiguang Fang, Zhenfa Zi, Mingzai Wu
Sluggish kinetics of oxygen electrocatalysis reactions on cathode and the strong corrosion of strong alkali electrolyte seriously affects the cycle life of zinc-air battery (ZABs). In order to solve the...
